name: authentic-couch-elise
description: Install and run the client `cd frontend && npm install && npm start`   Install and run the API `cd api && npm install && npm start`   Api on localhost:8080

scripts.start: concurrently 'cd api && nodemon index.js' 'cd frontend && npm start'  -n  'API,FRONTEND' --prefix name -c 'blue.bold,red.bold'

author: Elise
